Rulings.Base: 1. "Dragon Laser" targets the "Trigon", it is not a cost.\n2. If you cannot send the "Trigon" to the GY, because it isn't on the field or because it would be removed from play instead of sent to the GY, you cannot destroy your opponent's monsters.\n3. You only need to control "Delta Tri", not the "Trigon" equipped to it.
